steps.description: Add-Add 1 tablespoons of water to the bowl
steps.modified_description: Add-Add 3 tablespoons of water to the bowl

steps.description: Add-Add 1/4 teaspoon pepper to the bowl
Chop-Chop 1/4 red bell pepper into tiny bits
steps.modified_description: Chop-Chop 1/4 red bell pepper into large bits

errors.description: Don't chop enough. (large pieces are hard to cook)

steps.description: Microwave-Microwave the bowl, covered, for 2 minutes
steps.modified_description: Microwave-Microwave the bowl, covered, for 1 minute

errors.description: Under cook - Cook only for 1 minute

steps.description: Place-Place the chopped pepper in the microwave-safe bowl
steps.modified_description: (Spill)Place-Place the chopped pepper in the microwave-safe bowl

errors.description: Spill the pepper while adding it to the bowl

steps.description: Add-Add 1/3 cup cheddar cheese to a microwave-safe cup
Melt-Melt the cheese by microwaving cup for 30 sec. (Check after 30 seconds and microwave for 10 seconds more if needed).
steps.modified_description: Melt-Melt the cheese by microwaving cup for 10 sec.

errors.description: Microwave for 10 seconds - (Cheese will not melt)

steps.description: Mix-Mix the cheese and red bell pepper in the bowl
Add-Add 1/4 teaspoon salt to the bowl
add-add 1/2 tbsp softened butter to the bowl
Mix-Mix all the ingredients of the bowl well
